snippet: Falling oil prices related to concerns about oversupply led to a tumble that snapped a two-day market rally, in light trading.
abstract: Stock market declines slightly, snapping two-day rally, as energy shares tumble along with oil prices.
lead_paragraph: Falling oil prices related to concerns about oversupply led to a tumble that snapped a two-day market rally, in light trading.

headline.main: Oil Prices Drag Energy Shares Lower
headline.print_headline: Oil Prices Drag Energy Shares Lower
